import React,{useState} from 'react' import './NewPosts.scss' export default function NewPost() { const topics = ["art and culture", "human and nature", "technology", "science", "daily life", "society"] const [input, setInput] = useState("") function handleChange(event){ let value = event.target.value; if(value.length > 200){ value = value.slice(0,200) } setInput(value); } return (

New Posts

{200-input.length} characters left

) }
